task: Create a notification system with multiple channels and user preferences.
specification: Build a notification system supporting email, SMS, push notifications, and in-app alerts. Include user preferences, delivery tracking, rate limiting, and template management. Support scheduled notifications and delivery confirmations.

task: Design a content delivery network (CDN) with caching and load balancing.
specification: Create a CDN system with edge locations, intelligent caching, load balancing, and DDoS protection. Support cache invalidation, geographic routing, and analytics. Include health monitoring and automatic failover.

task: Implement a rate limiting service with multiple algorithms and distributed coordination.
specification: Create a rate limiting service supporting token bucket, sliding window, and fixed counter algorithms. Include distributed coordination using Redis, dynamic limit adjustment, and comprehensive monitoring. Support per-user and per-endpoint limits.

task: Build a search engine with indexing, ranking, and query optimization.
specification: Create a search engine with web crawling, document indexing (inverted index), relevance ranking (TF-IDF, PageRank), query optimization, and result caching. Support multiple languages and advanced search operators.

task: Create a workflow automation system with visual editor and execution engine.
specification: Build a workflow system with drag-and-drop visual editor, conditional logic, parallel execution, and error handling. Support integrations with external APIs, scheduling, and execution monitoring. Include template library.

task: Implement a database connection pool with health monitoring and automatic recovery.
specification: Create a database connection pool supporting multiple database types, connection health monitoring, automatic failover, connection validation, and performance metrics. Include pool sizing optimization and leak detection.

task: Build a real-time collaboration tool with operational transformation and conflict resolution.
specification: Create a real-time collaboration tool with document editing, operational transformation (OT), conflict resolution, user presence, and version control. Support rich text, comments, and change history. Include WebSocket communication.

task: Design a message queue system with dead letter queues and monitoring.
specification: Create a message queue system supporting multiple queue types, dead letter queues, message ordering, exactly-once delivery, and comprehensive monitoring. Include queue sharding, priority queuing, and delayed messaging.

task: Implement a feature flag system with A/B testing and gradual rollout.
specification: Create a feature flag system supporting dynamic flag management, A/B testing integration, gradual rollout, and real-time updates. Include user segmentation, rollout monitoring, and emergency rollback capabilities.

task: Build a time series database with compression and query optimization.
specification: Create a time series database with efficient compression, fast range queries, downsampling, and retention policies. Support multiple data types, aggregation functions, and real-time ingestion. Include backup and restore.

task: Create a plugin architecture system with dynamic loading and sandboxing.
specification: Build a plugin system supporting dynamic loading/unloading, sandboxed execution, API versioning, and dependency management. Include plugin discovery, security validation, and inter-plugin communication.

task: Implement a distributed transaction coordinator with two-phase commit.
specification: Create a distributed transaction coordinator supporting two-phase commit protocol, timeout handling, deadlock detection, and recovery mechanisms. Support multiple resource types and concurrent transactions. Include comprehensive logging.

task: Build a recommendation engine with collaborative filtering and content-based filtering.
specification: Create a recommendation engine supporting collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid approaches, and real-time updates. Include user profiling, item similarity calculation, and performance evaluation.

task: Design a microservices mesh with service discovery and traffic management.
specification: Create a service mesh supporting service discovery, load balancing, circuit breaking, and traffic routing. Include observability, security policies, and canary deployments. Support multiple protocols and automatic retries.

task: Implement a data migration tool with schema evolution and rollback.
specification: Create a data migration tool supporting schema evolution, data transformation, rollback capabilities, and validation. Include dry-run mode, progress tracking, and conflict resolution. Support multiple database types.

task: Build a real-time analytics dashboard with streaming data and interactive charts.
specification: Create a real-time analytics dashboard with streaming data ingestion, interactive charts, drill-down capabilities, and alerting. Support custom metrics, time-based filtering, and data export. Include responsive design.

task: Create a form validation library with custom rules and internationalization.
specification: Build a form validation library supporting custom validation rules, internationalization, async validation, and conditional validation. Include comprehensive error messages, field dependencies, and cross-field validation.

task: Implement a distributed cache with consistency and eviction policies.
specification: Create a distributed cache supporting consistency models (eventual, strong), multiple eviction policies (LRU, LFU, TTL), and cache warming. Include partitioning, replication, and failure recovery.

task: Build a state machine library with visual editor and debugging.
specification: Create a state machine library with visual editor, state transition validation, event handling, and debugging capabilities. Support hierarchical states, parallel states, and history tracking. Include export to multiple formats.

task: Design a serverless event processing system with exactly-once semantics.
specification: Create a serverless event processing system with exactly-once delivery, event ordering, dead letter queues, and replay capabilities. Include event schema validation, deduplication, and monitoring.

task: Implement a CSS framework with component system and theme support.
specification: Create a CSS framework with component-based styling, theme system (light/dark/custom), responsive design utilities, and animation library. Include CSS-in-JS support, utility classes, and comprehensive documentation.

task: Build a graph database query optimizer with execution planning.
specification: Create a query optimizer for graph databases supporting query analysis, execution planning, index selection, and cost estimation. Include multiple query languages, caching, and performance monitoring.

task: Create a testing framework with mocking, fixtures, and coverage reporting.
specification: Build a testing framework supporting unit tests, integration tests, mocking, fixtures, and coverage reporting. Include parameterized tests, test discovery, and CI/CD integration.

task: Implement a multi-tenant system with data isolation and resource management.
specification: Create a multi-tenant system with data isolation, resource quotas, custom configurations, and tenant management. Include security boundaries, performance monitoring, and automated provisioning.

task: Build a WebSocket library with connection management and message routing.
specification: Create a WebSocket library supporting connection management, message routing, room management, and reconnection logic. Include authentication, compression, and heartbeat monitoring.

task: Design a blockchain oracle system with external data integration.
specification: Create a blockchain oracle system supporting external data feeds, data validation, consensus mechanisms, and secure data delivery. Include multiple data sources, price feeds, and event triggers.

task: Implement a reactive programming library with observables and operators.
specification: Create a reactive programming library supporting observables, operators (map, filter, reduce), schedulers, and backpressure handling. Include TypeScript definitions and comprehensive documentation.

task: Build a distributed tracing system with span aggregation and analysis.
specification: Create a distributed tracing system supporting span collection, aggregation, sampling, and analysis. Include service maps, performance metrics, and root cause analysis. Support multiple protocols and automatic instrumentation.

task: Create a data serialization library with versioning and compatibility.
specification: Build a data serialization library supporting multiple formats (JSON, protobuf, Avro), schema versioning, backward compatibility, and validation. Include code generation and performance optimization.

task: Implement a knowledge graph construction system with entity extraction.
specification: Create a knowledge graph construction system with entity extraction, relationship identification, confidence scoring, and graph storage. Support multiple data sources, entity disambiguation, and query capabilities.

task: Build a command-line interface framework with plugins and help system.
specification: Create a CLI framework supporting command registration, plugin system, help generation, and configuration management. Include subcommands, argument validation, and colorful output.

task: Design a vector database with similarity search and indexing.
specification: Create a vector database supporting high-dimensional vectors, similarity search (ANN), efficient indexing, and batch operations. Include multiple distance metrics, clustering, and performance optimization.

task: Implement a reactive form system with validation and field dependencies.
specification: Create a reactive form system with field validation, dependencies, conditional rendering, and real-time updates. Include async validation, field arrays, and dynamic form generation.

task: Build a privacy-preserving computation system with secure aggregation.
specification: Create a privacy-preserving computation system supporting secure aggregation, differential privacy, homomorphic encryption, and zero-knowledge proofs. Include multiple computation types and audit trails.

task: Create a game engine with entity-component system and physics simulation.
specification: Build a game engine with entity-component system, physics simulation, collision detection, and rendering pipeline. Include scene management, asset loading, and performance profiling.

task: Implement a distributed consensus algorithm with fault tolerance.
specification: Create a distributed consensus algorithm supporting Byzantine fault tolerance, leader election, log replication, and view changes. Include multiple consensus types and performance optimization.

task: Build a markdown editor with preview and extension system.
specification: Create a markdown editor with live preview, syntax highlighting, extension system, and export options. Include custom extensions, collaborative editing, and version history.

task: Design a quantum-resistant cryptography library with post-quantum algorithms.
specification: Create a cryptography library supporting post-quantum algorithms (lattice-based, hash-based, code-based), key management, and digital signatures. Include performance benchmarks and security audits.

task: Implement a reactive data store with computed properties and persistence.
specification: Create a reactive data store with computed properties, automatic persistence, change tracking, and transaction support. Include optimistic locking, conflict resolution, and undo/redo.

task: Build a federated learning system with privacy preservation.
specification: Create a federated learning system supporting model aggregation, privacy preservation, secure communication, and participant management. Include multiple learning algorithms and convergence monitoring.

task: Create a virtual DOM implementation with diffing and patching.
specification: Build a virtual DOM implementation with efficient diffing, patching, event handling, and component lifecycle. Include SSR support, hydration, and performance optimization.

task: Implement a zero-knowledge proof system with privacy verification.
specification: Create a zero-knowledge proof system supporting multiple proof types (range proofs, membership proofs), privacy verification, and audit trails. Include proof generation, verification, and batch processing.

task: Build a real-time collaboration platform with CRDTs and sync.
specification: Create a real-time collaboration platform using Conflict-free Replicated Data Types (CRDTs), operational transformation, and synchronization. Support multiple data types, conflict resolution, and offline support.

task: Design a neural architecture search system with automated optimization.
specification: Create a neural architecture search system supporting automated architecture generation, hyperparameter optimization, performance evaluation, and early stopping. Include multiple search spaces and transfer learning.

task: Implement a reactive routing system with lazy loading and code splitting.
specification: Create a reactive routing system with lazy loading, code splitting, route guards, and navigation history. Include breadcrumb navigation, meta tags, and SEO optimization.
